taskbody.prereq:
This task will teach you how to properly wash dishes, and where to find the proper tools to execute this task.
Mom, please disregard this entire task. You have done enough dishes for me to last a lifetime.
Tools:
Sponge
Tide Detergent Pods
Dirty Dishes

step.cmd: Collect all of the dirty dishes that you have used in the process of making this delicious breakfast.
Scrape excess food and scraps from each individual dish into the trash can
step.info: This step is extremely important, because no large chunks of food can go into the drain.The sink does not have a garbage disposal, so if too much food accumulates in the disposal, it will clog and you will have to go in there with your hand an scoop out the gunk.

step.cmd: Place all appropriately sized dishes into the dishwasher

substep.cmd: Place drinking glasses and irregular cooking utensils (like spatulas) onto the top rack of the dishwasher
Place plates, normal utensils, other larger dishes onto the bottom rack of the dishwasher

step.cmd: Close the dishwasher door and flip the lock mechanism to the right
Rotate the black knob clockwise to the setting that reads "Quick Wash"
Once the dishes are finished and have fully dried, place them back in their original cabinets and cubbies
